source:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
The lovelorn townsdwarf is gazing wistfully into the distance.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
トメラの村の悩めるドワーフは、上の空でどこか遠くを眺めている。
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_TODO_03<tab>悩めるドワーフと再度話す

source:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_000
Have you ever felt love's piercing sting?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_000はあ…………
なあ、アンタ、恋をした経験はあるか？

source: TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_001<tab>There's this Hume girl─no, this Hume <var 1A 02 /var>lady<var 1A 01 /var>─who's stabbed me right through the heart. I saw her on my way back from the mines, and I've been dreaming of her ever since...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_001オレは今、とある女性に心を奪われているんだ……。
採掘の帰りに見かけた、ヒュム族の女性なんだが、
気が付いたら、ずっとその人のことを考えている。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_002<tab>They say love is a dance, aye? Well, I've been watching from the edges for long enough─I think it's time I took to the floor!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_002恋っていうのは、押して引くものなんだろう？
オレはこれまでずっと、引いた状態で彼女を見つめてきた。
だからそろそろ、オレのことをアピールしていきたいんだ！

source:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_003She should be on her way to fetch water from the river soon, but...
Gah, I'm too nervous to approach her alone. Would you come with me? Please, you've got to come with me!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_003そろそろ彼女が水を汲みに来る時間だ。
頼む！　オレひとりじゃ不安なんだ、一緒に来てくれ！
こんなこと、仲間には頼めないんだよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_004<tab>Thank you─you're the best friend I never had! Off to Boiled Owl Bridge we go!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_004助かるぜ！
それじゃあ「ボイルドアウルブリッジ」まで、一緒に来てくれ！

source:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_022Look, there she is!
This is it, then. I'm just going to...stay right here because I'm a big, bearded coward.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_022あ、あそこにいるのが彼女だ……。
うう、ううう……ダメだ、ちゃんと話せる気がしない。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_012<tab>...I need another favor from you. Will you ask her if she's wed? And if unwed, then what manner of man makes her swoon? Oh, and make sure to be subtle!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_012……一生のお願いだ！
アンタ、彼女に、結婚しているのか、していないなら、
好きな男性のタイプは何か、聞いてきてくれないか！？

source: TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_013<tab>I'm like to stumble over my own tongue if I try talking to her now. No, first I need you to ask if she's wed, or, if unwed, her preference in men. Perfectly innocent questions from a perfect stranger!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_013こんなザマじゃ、オレを好きになってもらえるわけがない……！
頼む、あそこにいる彼女に、結婚しているのか、
していないなら好きな男性のタイプは何か、聞いてきてほしい！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_LADY03552_000_020<tab>Oh, weren't you the <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((man)) /var> who was traveling with Alphinaud? He spoke very highly of you, you know. Said he admired both your strength of arm and strength of character.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_LADY03552_000_020……あら、あなた、アルフィノくんと一緒にいた旅人さんね？
彼から話を聞いたことがあるのよ。
とても強くて優しい、憧れの人がいるんだ……ってね。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_LADY03552_000_021<tab>Now, what could such an admirable <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((fellow)) /var> want with a simple girl like me?
target: TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_LADY03552_000_021<tab>うふふ、それで、わたしに何か用かしら？

source: TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_LADY03552_000_022<tab>...Am I wed? Well, no...and I've no prospects to speak of, neither. Amity is not exactly bursting at the seams with suitors.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_LADY03552_000_022……え、け、結婚？
まだ結婚してはいないし、いい人もいないわ。
なにせアミティーは、出会いなんてほとんどないもの。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_LADY03552_000_023<tab>...And if I were to pick a suitor? Gracious me, you are forward, aren't you?
target: TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_LADY03552_000_023……好きな男性のタイプ？

source: TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_LADY03552_000_024<tab>Hmmm... Well, it's what's on the inside that counts, isn't it? I would hope to meet a soul filled with warmth and kindness─someone much like how Alphinaud described <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, I suppose.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_LADY03552_000_024そうね……外見よりも重要なのは中身ね。
たとえば、アルフィノくんから聞いた「あなた」みたいに、
とても優しい人が好きよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_LADY03552_000_025<tab>No, I've no interest in how a person looks. I'd seek a partner with your qualities─someone kind and generous.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_LADY03552_000_025そうね……外見よりも重要なのは中身ね。
たとえば、アルフィノくんから聞いた「あなた」みたいに、
とても優しい人が好きよ。
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_Q1_000_000<tab>ヒュム族の女性はなんと言っていた？

source: TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_031<tab>...Kindness? What, like the sort of kindness you showed me...?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_031なるほど、優しさか……。
……ハッ、それは、見ず知らずのオレのために行動してくれた、
アンタのような……？

source: TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_032<tab>Hm? Is that something other folk judge their partners by?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_032……ん？
ひょっとして、ほかの種族の奴は、
見てくれで判断することが多いのか？

source: TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_033<tab>In my village, it ain't considered polite to show your face until <var 1A 02 /var>after<var 1A 01 /var> you're wed. Helms stay on outside the family home! Still, it probably helps that she's not concerned with how I look...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_033オレたちドワーフは素顔を見せずに結婚して、
家族になって初めて、お互いの外見を知るのが普通なんだ。
まあ何にせよ、彼女が外見を気にしないのは嬉しいな！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_034<tab>...Sh-She did!? And here I thought I'd brought an ally, not a rival!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_034な、なな、なんだってぇ！？
ぐ……まさか、恋敵がこんなに近くにいただなんて……！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_035<tab><cough> Well, we should be heading back, then. It ain't right for me to demand help then leave you unpaid for your counsel!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_035……ともかく、一旦村に戻ろう！
アンタにお礼も渡さないといけないしな！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_040<tab>I was wrestling with the idea on the way home, and I've come to a conclusion: to win my lady's heart, I need to be more like you!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_040帰り道に考えてみたんだが、
やっぱり、アンタみたいになることが、
彼女を射止める一番の近道だと思う！

source:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_041I'll travel the world, and make of myself a man worth marrying. Aye, I think I need to have a word with the chief...
Thanks again for coming along, friend!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI016_03552_DWARF03552_000_041まずはアンタみたいに、各地を旅してみるか……
よし、長老に相談してみよう。
いろいろとありがとうな！
